text: Lehigh University is an American private research university in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. It was founded in 1865 by businessman Asa Packer. In 2020, U.S. News & World Report ranked Lehigh as the 50th best university in the nation. == References == Category:19th-century establishments in Pennsylvania Category:1865 establishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Pennsylvania Category:Bethlehem, Pennsylvania
title: Lehigh University
